price: 18. Maalintaas waa la idin soo bandhigi, ma jirto sir aad leedihiin oo qarsoonaan.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
